automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Upload malicious file sample to MISP.
automation.name: misp_upload_sample

automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Download malicious file sample from MISP.
automation.name: misp_download_sample

commands.description: Search for events in MISP. This search command will return only information about the matched events. To get information about attributes, use the misp-search-attributes command.
commands.name: misp-search-events

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given domain.
commands.name: domain

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given email address.
commands.name: email

commands.description: Checks the file reputation of the given hash.
commands.name: file

commands.description: Checks the reputation of the given URL.
commands.name: url

commands.description: Checks the reputation of an IP address.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Creates a new MISP event.
commands.name: misp-create-event

commands.description: Adds an attribute to an existing MISP event.
commands.name: misp-add-attribute

commands.description: Deletes an event according to the given event ID.
commands.name: misp-delete-event

commands.description: Removes a tag from the given UUID event .
commands.name: misp-remove-tag-from-event

commands.description: Adds a tag to the given UUID event .
commands.name: misp-add-tag-to-event

commands.description: Adds a tag to the given UUID attribute.
commands.name: misp-add-tag-to-attribute

commands.description: Removes a tag from the given UUID attribute.
commands.name: misp-remove-tag-from-attribute

commands.description: Add sighting to an attribute.
commands.name: misp-add-sighting

commands.description: Adds an OSINT feed. Only feeds in the misp format are allowed. For example have manifest.json.
commands.name: misp-add-events-from-feed

commands.description: Adds a file object to the specified event ID.
commands.name: misp-add-file-object

commands.description: Adds a domain object to MISP.
commands.name: misp-add-domain-object

commands.description: Adds a URL object to an MISP event.
commands.name: misp-add-url-object

commands.description: Adds any other object to MISP.
commands.name: misp-add-object

commands.description: Adds an IP object to the MISP event. The following arguments are optional, but at least one must be supplied for the command to run successfully: "ip", "dst_port", "src_port", "domain", "hostname", "ip_src", and "ip_dst".
commands.name: misp-add-ip-object

commands.description: Search for attributes in MISP.
commands.name: misp-search-attributes

commands.description: Update an attribute of an existing MISP event.
commands.name: misp-update-attribute

commands.description: Delete an attribute according to the given attribute ID.
commands.name: misp-delete-attribute

commands.description: Publish an event.
commands.name: misp-publish-event

commands.description: Set event attributes according to the given attributes data.
commands.name: misp-set-event-attributes

commands.description: Check a list of indicator values against the MISP warninglist.
commands.name: misp-check-warninglist
